statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id DESC;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 3;
SELECT key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT key_id, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at ASC;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'Master';
SELECT key_id, key_name FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT key_id, key_name FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT key_id, key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control;
SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control ORDER BY access_level DESC;

SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE access_level > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT key_id, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id IN ('123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000', '98765432-12a4-5678-b89c-321416742000');
SELECT user_id, access_level FROM access_control WHERE user_id = '98765432-12a4-5678-b89c-321416742000' AND access_level < 10;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys JOIN access_control ON encryption_keys.key_id = access_control.user_id ORDER BY encryption_key ASC, access_level DESC;
